## Feature Description

A clear description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem It Solves

What problem does this feature solve? (e.g., "It's hard to find other players" or "Boss fights are too easy")

## Proposed Solution

How do you think this feature should work?

## Alternative Solutions

Are there other ways to solve this problem?

## Additional Context

- Would this be for singleplayer, multiplayer, or both?
- Any examples from other games?
- Sketches or mockups (if applicable)

## Complexity Estimate

How complex do you think this feature would be?

- [ ] Small (a few hours)
- [ ] Medium (a few days)
- [ ] Large (a week or more)
- [ ] Not sure

## Willingness to Help

- [ ] I'd like to implement this myself
- [ ] I can help test this
- [ ] I'm just suggesting the idea
